title: ICT and E-learning Integration Effectiveness Evaluation: Social Domain Learning Strategy Development

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary ICT application skills and grasp of core social science concepts
context.additional_context: Learning scenarios in limited-technology environments modeled after public universities in Sindh, Pakistan, analyzing ICT integration effectiveness via smartphone-based LMS and project-based assessments.

learning_goals: Learners can write analytical reports on global social issues using LMS and mobile tools.
Learners can develop a system for evaluating and selecting digital information sources and create data visualization outputs.
Learners can finalize team-based project proposals on the effectiveness of ICT-integrated learning by incorporating peer assessment feedback.

resources: Access to digital archives on social issues
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
